title: Why doesn't BTS promote 'Dynamite' in music shows? - Quora

response.answer_text: Dynamite is an English single which was promoted in the West. Although Dynamite has around 18 wins in Korean music shows, it wasn’t promoted there as it wasn’t a Korean song. It’s a surprise that a non-promoted song which wasn’t even performed on the shows is getting so many wins but that’s facts. Have a nice day… :)
